entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
